about_the_game:
Step into the immersive, bustling world of Varista - an exciting and dynamic VR barista simulation experience! Begin your journey in a modest market Cafe, honing your barista skills and working diligently to earn the trust of a wide variety of customers. From brewing the perfect cup of coffee to serving delicious pastries fresh from the bakery, you'll master the art of time management and customer service. Will you be able to save enough tips to fulfill your dream of owning your own franchise?

The engaging gameplay of Varista extends well beyond the counter. Armed with a trusty tablet, you'll dive into the nitty-gritty of business management. From strategically ordering new inventory - be it coffee beans or croissants - to carefully managing supplies based on customer demands, you'll be in control of your growing operations.

Varista is more than a game, it's an entrepreneurial journey - a captivating blend of strategy, creativity, and fast-paced action. Experience the thrill of running a coffee shop, the joy of satisfied customers, and the gratifying challenge of growing a business. Will you rise to the occasion and transform your humble beginnings into a flourishing coffee empire?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64 bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 7500 or AMD Equivalent
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD Equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: Oculus Quest 2
  • Additional Notes: Other HMDsupport may vary
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core I7 9700k or AMD Equivalent
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 or AMD Equivalent
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: Oculus Quest 2
  • Additional Notes: Other HMD support may vary
